wikipedia_page.main:
Mark Andrew Geoffrey Kent  (born Spilsby 14 January 1966) has been UK ambassador to Argentina since 2016.
Kent was educated at Queen Elizabeth's Grammar School, Horncastle and Lincoln College, Oxford. He joined Her Majesty's Diplomatic Service in 1987. He  served in Brasilia, Brussels, Mexico City and Casteau before being appointed Ambassador to Vietnam in 2007. From 2012 to 2016 he was Ambassador to Thailand.Kent was appointed Companion of the Order of St Michael and St George (CMG) in the 2020 Birthday Honours for services to British foreign policy.

response: * Mark Kent, UK Ambassador to Vietnam (2008–2010)

List of ambassadors of the United Kingdom to Thailand

response: Argentina has an embassy in London and the United Kingdom has an embassy in Buenos Aires. The current British Ambassador to Argentina is Mark Kent and the current Argentine Ambassador to the United Kingdom is Javier Esteban Figueroa. Both states are members of the G-20.

link_mentions.page: List of ambassadors of the United Kingdom to Vietnam

response: In December 2020 Hayes was appointed to be British Ambassador to Argentina in succession to Mark Kent. She will take up the position in September 2021.
